page.title: 10Farming Near Goonhavern
page.content: Most farms around us have a mixture of allsorts.A lot of people produce beef,corn and silage.The main breed of beef cattle used is Fresian which produces good quality meat.This year there is a lot of wheat,barley,oats and dredge corn.There is a large amount of peas which have large flowers that are fed to the livestock to help their digestive system.Potatoes are also grown both for marketing and for feeding cattle.Quite a lot of kale is grown for sheep and cattle to graze at.Some of the farm do not have mains electricity and are powered by generators.A number do not have mains drains either and have cess pits instead.The farming community here is very friendly.Tourists enjoy holidaying on the farms as well.
